document.full_text: bahrain has made a formal complaint to the lebanese government over shi'ite muslim hezbollah's offer of support to mainly shi'ite protesters demanding reforms in the sunni-ruled gulf arab kingdom.
document.title: bahrain complains over hezbollah comments on protests
lines_and_colors: bahrain has made a formal complaint to the lebanese government over shi'ite muslim hezbollah's offer of support to mainly shi'ite protesters demanding reforms in the sunni-ruled gulf arab kingdom.
